name: Q1p
text: How positive were you feeling (for example, happy or joyful) just before you received this survey?

name: Q7d
text: How negative were you feeling (for example, stressed, mad/angry, nervous/anxious, or sad) just before you received this survey?

name: Q9d
text: In the past 24 hours, have you had a misunderstanding or disagreement with your child?

name: Q10
text: In the past 24 hours, how easy was it for your child to talk to you about their thoughts and feelings?
